item.title: By: John Smith

item.description: This phone worked well (1.5 yrs) until I updated it through vzw. After that, nothing but problems. Battery life plummeted, freezes and now I get the following msg: "Activating your phone. Please wait until this process your phone...This proces...
item.content:encoded: This phone worked well (1.5 yrs) until I updated it through vzw. After that, nothing but problems. Battery life plummeted, freezes and now I get the following msg: “Activating your phone. Please wait until this process your phone…This proces…
